name: Bicep Curls on Yoga Mat

instructions.description: Stand on the yoga mat with feet hip-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand with palms facing forward.
Keeping your elbows close to your sides, exhale and slowly curl the weights towards your shoulders.
Pause at the top of the movement, then inhale and slowly lower the weights back to the starting position.
Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

variations.description: Use lighter weights or perform the exercise seated on a chair.

commentsNotes: Ensure proper form by keeping your back straight and core engaged.
Avoid swinging the weights or using momentum to lift them.
